content: I want to search on the Goal.addresses element with a Condition id, e.g. Goal?addresses=Condition/123. However, 'addresses' element is not searchable in the spec. Is there any other way to search for this? I am using the HAPI STU3 server.
you can define your own search parameters in HAPI
Thanks, Grahame, I'll look into HAPI search. I am using the HSPC sandbox server, assume this user-defined search will need to be configured in the server?
